alert.note: Alert for Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Windham and southern Tolland Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Columbia, or 7 miles north of Colchester, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Windham, Plainfield, Willimantic, Coventry, Hebron, Brooklyn, Columbia, Canterbury, Ashford, Pomfret, Andover, Chaplin, Hampton, Eastford and Scotland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
